thread.section_title: New York Hilton Midtown - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Gets Important Things Right
thread.title_full: Gets Important Things Right - Review of New York Hilton Midtown, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Joseph F
title: Gets Important Things Right
text:
The important part. Room was spacious, modern and clean. Quiet. Location is great if you need/want Midtown. It even has a kind of late 60's design charm.
The lobby is loud. I don't know why someone didn't try to put some soft surfaces to absorb noise. You are not going to want to enjoy the hotel bar (imo).
They could be a bit more generous with hilton honors members. No water, no free bar like I would invariably receive as a diamond member.
I would stay again.
